duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide support performing duties related to customer service, stocking, and sanitation in assigned department(s).
Perform opening, mid, and closing duties as assigned.
Prepare, package, weigh, and price products for sale.
Maximize sales potential through effective and proper procedures for prepping, storing, rotating, stocking, and merchandising product.
Maintain a clean and sanitary working and shopping environment; maintain equipment in accordance with Whole Foods Market cleanliness and safety standards.
